name: 10 minutes 1 hour 2 hours
description:
If you beat the world record tell me in the comments and I will change it in the game!

Arrow keys to move around and jump

This was a gem challenge. I made one game in 10 minutes another in 1 hour and one more in 2 hours. This was super fun and I recommend you to try it out. The UI  and the record stuff were created after the project. I made a youtube video about the whole thing check it out!
